title: Pan-fried Steaks with Italian Sauce
ingredients: ['4 rump or sirloin steaks, trimmed of fat, about 125g each', '2 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '100ml white or red wine', '300g tagliatelle', '1 tbsp capers, drained and rinsed', '12 stoned black or green olives, halved', '2 tbsp chopped fresh basil, plus basil leaves, to garnish (optional)']
